markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Progression](/Rules.aspx?ID=1965)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 186 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
A blighted boon grows in potency within the user's body, progressing in stages. While in any stage from a blighted boon, the [partaker](/Rules.aspx?ID=1964) is temporarily immune to other versions of the same blighted boon. Unless the boon's description says otherwise, the effects of each stage combine, often growing stronger over time.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<document level="2" id="rules-1966" />

<document level="2" id="rules-1967" />

<document level="2" id="rules-1968" />
name: Progression

text: Progression Source Treasure Vault pg. 186 1.1 A blighted boon grows in potency within the user's body, progressing in stages. While in any stage from a blighted boon, the partaker is temporarily immune to other versions of the same blighted boon. Unless the boon's description says otherwise, the effects of each stage combine, often growing stronger over time.
